mapper.sql: id, cover, name, subject, grade, learning_style , class_hours , collection_num , author, enclosure, enc_des , status,unique_num
mapper.select: select cc.id, cc.cover, cc.name, cc.subject, cc.grade, cc.learning_style learningStyle, cc.class_hours classHours, cc.collection_num collectionNum, cc.author, cc.enclosure, cc.enc_des encDes, cc.status, cc.unique_num uniqueNum, cc.des,cc.wxdes, IFNULL(SUM(cu.num*cu.unit_price),0) as totalPrice from hklk_curriculum cc left join hklk_consumables cu on cc.id = cu.curriculum_id where cc.id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER} group by cc.id
select id from hklk_curriculum where unique_num = #{unique_num,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select * from (select t.id, t.cover, t.name, t.subject, t.grade, t.learning_style, t.class_hours, t.collection_num, t.author, t.enc_des, t.status,t.teacher_id ,(CASE count(c.id) WHEN 0 THEN 'false' ELSE 'true' END) as ishc from hklk_curriculum t LEFT join hklk_consumables c on t.id=c.curriculum_id where 1=1
(is_public = 1 or teacher_id in (select id from hklk_school_teacher st where st.school_id = #{teacherId}))
and is_public = 1
GROUP BY t.id ) cc where status=1
and cc.name like CONCAT('%', #{name}, '%')
and cc.grade like CONCAT('%', #{grade}, '%')
and cc.learning_style like CONCAT('%', #{learningStyle}, '%')
and cc.subject like CONCAT('%', #{subject}, '%')
order by id desc

select id,cover,name,subject,grade,learning_style as learningStyle,class_hours as classHours, collection_num as collectionNum , author,enc_des as encDes, status,is_public as isPublic, teacher_id as teacherId,ishc,enclosure from (select t.id, t.cover, t.name, t.subject, t.grade, t.learning_style, t.class_hours, t.collection_num, t.author, t.enc_des, t.status,t.is_public,t.teacher_id ,(CASE count(c.id) WHEN 0 THEN 'false' ELSE 'true' END) as ishc,t.enclosure from hklk_curriculum t LEFT join hklk_consumables c on t.id=c.curriculum_id GROUP BY t.id ) cc where status=1
and cc.name like CONCAT('%', #{name}, '%')
and cc.grade like CONCAT('%', #{grade}, '%')
and cc.learning_style like CONCAT('%', #{learningStyle}, '%')
and cc.subject like CONCAT('%', #{subject}, '%')
and cc.teacher_id = #{teacherId}
and is_public = 1
order by id desc

select cc.id, cc.cover, cc.name, cc.subject, cc.grade, cc.learning_style learningStyle, cc.class_hours classHours, cc.collection_num collectionNum, cc.author, cc.enclosure, cc.enc_des encDes, cc.status, cc.unique_num uniqueNum, cc.des,cc.wxdes, IFNULL(SUM(cu.num*cu.unit_price),0) as totalPrice,cc.twxdes1,cc.twxdes2 from hklk_curriculum cc left join hklk_consumables cu on cc.id = cu.curriculum_id where cc.id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER} group by cc.id
